settings.title: Custom Sublimation Services
settings.text: If you can imagine it – We can Produce it

Custom Manufacturing and Sublimation Services

We offer a free custom sports and work wear design service.

If you can imagine it – We can Produce it

Wear Your design, using our expert Knowlege, experience and buying power.
Stand out from the crowd and get into the kit that your team deserves.
From on-field playing uniforms, Polo Shirts, tracksuits, bags and other sporting items,
to work wear, Hi vis, suits, shirts and much more, we have the knowlege and experience to fit your team or company out so you llok and feel great.

settings.heading: Dream it – Design it – Wear it
settings.subheading:
Imagine your team running around in your favourite team colours, kit design and unique jersey that you helped create.
Well, By using our services, this is possible.
From initial design to concept, manufacturing and delivery, our custom and sublimation services are available to all clubs and teams, and individuals.
Unlimited logos, names, numbers and in any garment style.

settings.heading: Nothing to Worry About
settings.subheading: Anyone can search Ailibaba and find a manufacturer who promise the best and deliver the worst. At IS Apparel, we have representatives at factory level to ensure quality and so you get what you asked for. With a very low MOQ, extremely quick turn-a-round times, it is now possible to fit out your social team, club or association. Let us use our wealth experience in custom making sports apparel and work wear and take the head ache away from you.

settings.heading: Quality Control
settings.subheading:
Our manufacturing partners have worked closely with many local, national and international teams to ensure they walk onto the field or court not only looking great but feeling fantastic. Our fabrics are of the highest standard, our manufacturing processes as second to none and we ensure that from design concept to delivery, everything will run smoothly, on time and on budget.
Contact us to find out more
